content: अपकर्मन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [बहु. स.] Of bad or degraded actions, corrupted, depraved. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} (°र्म) {@--1@} Discharge, paying off (of a debt); दत्तस्यानपकर्म च <ls>Ms. 8. 4.</ls> {@--2@} An improper or unworthy act; evil doing, conduct, or course, any degrading or impure act. {@--3@} Wickedness, violence, oppression. {@--4@} Incompetence, laziness.
